Container.Name: wh-immich-power-tools
Container.Overview: Power tools for organizing your immich library.
Container.Requires: Immich Power Tools requires: - An Immich instance and an Immich API key. Obtaining an Immich API key: https://immich.app/docs/features/command-line-interface/#obtain-the-api-key

Config.Name: Immich Power Tools web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port Immich Power Tools listens on.

Config.Name: IMMICH_API_KEY
Config.Description: The API key for your Immich instance.

Config.Name: IMMICH_URL
Config.Description: The URL to your Immich instance.

Config.Name: DB_HOST
Config.Description: The PostgreSQL hostname for your Immich instance.

Config.Name: DB_PORT
Config.Description: The PostgreSQL port for your Immich instance.

Config.Name: DB_USERNAME
Config.Description: The PostgreSQL username for your Immich instance.

Config.Name: DB_PASSWORD
Config.Description: The PostgreSQL password for your Immich instance.

Config.Name: DB_DATABASE_NAME
Config.Description: The PostgreSQL database name for your Immich instance.
